name: VTE
title: VTE
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Describes denominator criteria for DSRIP 47-Hospital Acquired Potentially Preventable Venous Thromboembolism in Appendix A-20),(Data Element Scope: ICD-10CM codes for VTE),(Inclusion Criteria: As defined by DSRIP 47),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms listed in Appendix A-20 for ICD-10CM Codes)
